name: ShovelBear
description: Get ready for action packed battles with bears and SHOVELS. Shovel Bear is a platform fighter with unique power ups taking inspiration from video games and ANIME. The goal of the game is simple: smack, bop, dig, and stomp your enemy bear in a 1v1 to launch them off the map and prove yourself to be the best SHOVEL BEAR! Choose from 4 unique maps, with more in development. Enjoy a carefully crafted OST as you battle your friends and CPU's in the most unique platform fighter to date! This is the game you didn't ask for, but you TOTALLY NEED!
